name: Dragonnet Havoc
description:
A game about building a team to fight and defend the town. Prepare at daytime and fight at night in a mix between a tower defense, real-time strategy and creature collection game.

Breed dragonnets

Dragonnets come in many shapes and sizes. Try different combinations of parents to find the dragonnets best suited for you. Experiment and discover over 50 different dragonnet species.

Train and prepare

Train your dragonnets and prepare for the impending night. Don't forget to stock up on items. Befriending your neighbors may not be a bad idea either.

Battle at night

At nighttime ghosts will come to attack the town. It is your job to protect it with the help of your dragonnet partners. Order your allies to move around the battlefield to attack enemies.
